actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act for the purposes of increasing the maximum amounts of real estate and operating loans.

summary.text: Amends the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to increase the limitation requirements regarding real estate loans: (1) from $225,000 to $325,000 as to the unpaid indebtedness against the farm or other security at the time the loan is made; and (2) from $100,000 to $200,000 as to the loans to any one borrower. Increases from $50,000 to $125,000 the ceiling on the total principal indebtedness which may be outstanding at any one time for operating loans.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act for the purposes of increasing the maximum amounts of real estate and operating loans.
